QW-WCAG-T17.name: Positioning labels to maximize predictability of relationships
QW-WCAG-T17.description: This technique checks the correct position of labels in forms

metadata.description: The form field label is empty.

results.description: The form field has well positioned label.

elements.pointer: html > body:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > form:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1) > input:nth-child(1)
